name: Logitech G500 Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [12 megapixels/second Image processing, 30G Max. acceleration, 8 million clicks Buttons, Gaming-grade laser: Game-changing precision at any hand speed, Onboard memory: You can save your settings on the mouse, Weight tuning: Up to 27 grams of extra weights lets you mix-and-match for personalized feel and control., Dual-mode scroll wheel: You get precise click-to-click scrolling that’s perfect for weapon selection when you’re gaming. Hyper-fast scrolling lets you fly through long Web pages., Adjustable sensitivity, 10 programmable buttons]
